SELECT si.id, si.purchase_type AS purchaseType, si.supplier_name AS supplierName, si.remark, si.create_date AS createDate FROM supplier_info si WHERE 1 = 1
and si.supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplierInfo.supplierName},'%')
and si.purchase_type = #{supplierInfo.purchaseType}
ORDER BY si.create_date DESC
